definition: lit. to fear the wolf in front and the tiger behind (idiom)/fig. to be full of needless fears/reds under the beds
pinyin: qian2 pa4 lang2 hou4 pa4 hu3

definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
